description.en: `vaizAkha-mAsaH` begins today --- special for various `dAnam`'s such as buttermilk, `pAnakam` etc. Brings unlimited `puNyam`!

shlokas:
vaizAkhE mAsiyOdadyAttakraMtApavinAzanam..41..
vidyAvAndhanavAnbhUmau jAyatE nAtra saMzayaH ..
na takrasadRzaM dAnaM gharmakAlESu vidyatE..42..
tasmAttakraM pradAtavyamadhvazrAMtadvijAtayE ..
jaMbIrasurasOpEtaM lasallavaNamizritam..43..
yastakramarucighnaMtudattvAmOkSamavApnuyAt ..
yO dadyAddadhikhaMDaMtuvaizAkhEgharmazAMtayE..44..
tasya puNyaphalaM vaktuM nAhaM zaknOmi bhUmipa ..
yO dadyAttaMDulAndivyAnmadhusUdanavallabhE..45..
sa labhEtpUrNamAyuSyaM sarvayajJaphalaM labhEt ..
yO ghRtaM tEjasO rUpaM gavyaM dadyAddvijAtayE ..
sO'zvamEdhaphalaM prApya mOdatE viSNumaMdirE..46..
urvAruguDasaMmizraM vaizAkhE mESagE ravau ..
sarvapApavinirmuktaH zvEtadvIpE vasEddhruvam..47..
yazcEkSudaMDaM sAyAhnE divA tApOpazAntayE ..
brAhmaNAyacayOdadyAttasya puNyamanaMtakam..48..
vaizAkhE pAnakaM dattvA sAyAhnE zramazAntayE ..
sarvapApavinirmuktO viSNOH sAyujyamApnuyAt ..49..
saphalaM pAnakaM mESamAsE sAyaM dvijAtayE ..
dadyAttEna pitRRNAMtusudhApAnaMnasaMzayaH.50..
vaizAkhE pAnakaM cUtasupakvaphalasaMyutam ..
tasya sarvANi pApAni vinAzaM yAMti nizcitam..51..
-- skandapurANE dvitIyE vaiSNavakhaNDE vaizAkhamAhAtmyE tRtIyE adhyAyE
